name: XMI2.1CompleteExportedProjects
short_description:
Complete XMI 2.1 Projects to reverse code engineering
If you need to experiment for free with XMI 2.1

From these projects you could automatically generate source code.
Used by the italian philosopher, fantasy writer and programmer Usai Luigi to automatically create source code in many languages.
